name: Blood Zombie
description: The Blood Zombie is a decayed, medium-sized undead creature with a gaunt appearance, its body is a pale, bluish color with remnants of its former life. It moves slowly but possesses great strength despite its low agility.
memorable: The Blood Zombie's ability to drain life from attackers and become temporarily stronger makes it a uniquely dangerous opponent in melee combat.
goals: Typically roams in search of living creatures to attack and drain their life force.
relations: Related to other undead creatures like zombies and ghouls, often encountered in dark, eerie locations.
environment: Dark and desolate areas, such as graveyards, abandoned buildings, or remote ruins.
strengths: Impressive durability with high hit points and the ability to gain temporary hit points from its blood drain ability.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage which disrupts its regenerative capabilities and prevents its blood drain ability.
attacks: Employs a slam attack that deals both bludgeoning and necrotic damage, enhancing its threat level in combat with life-draining effects.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Drain allows it to inflict necrotic damage and gain temporary hit points, empowering its combat effectiveness.
additional_information: Has the Undead Fortitude ability, allowing it to potentially survive lethal damage.
Damage immunities to poison, enhancing its survivability against certain attacks.
Low Dexterity which indicates slow movement and reduced agility.
Can regain temporary hit points through its Blood Drain ability.
Significant physical strength despite its undead form.
